means: 狂欢宴会( orgy的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Judges had been engaging in sexual orgies.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些法官居然一直参加色情狂欢聚会.

sentence.Network_en: These rules enable anyone to perform orgies of differentiation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些法则使我们会大量地进行微分.

sentence.Network_en: " I dono. But robbers always have orgies, and of course we've got to have them, too.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我也不知道, 不过强盗们总是聚会痛饮, 我们当然也要这样做.

PerfectNetExp.abs: one didn't know from concrete examples that international sporting contests lead to orgies of hatred .人们没有从具体的实例得知国际体育比赛导致了深仇大恨。
Marie : before Christ was a time of orgies . then came love .玛丽：在基督之前是一段放荡的时期，然后才有了爱。
chinese salesman jailed for organising gay orgies ., 中国销售员因组织同性恋聚会被拘禁.

list.abs: he casts forth in orgy wild ., 他对着荒野向前掷出.
a midnight meeting of witches to practice witchcraft and sorcery ; in the Middle Ages it was supposed to be a demonic orgy .半夜女巫施行魔法和魔术；中世纪时被认为是恶魔的狂欢。
...。若物体之间有必要有远隔作用，必需用讯息传递的方式进行。适当的设计可以大幅限制远隔作用的发生，因此也使系统比较容易维护。不良的介面设计会造成不羁的对象|object orgy，上帝对象或是其他不依照得墨忒耳定律的物件。函数程式语言|程式语言的好处是减少远隔作用出现的可能性，.
mob暴徒orgy of bloodshed大规模血洗outrage暴行，（因暴行而引起的）义愤

entry.def: An orgy is a party in which people behave in a very uncontrolled way, especially one involving sexual activity.

example.ex: It was reminiscent of a scene from a Roman orgy.
example.tran: 这一幕让人想起古罗马荒淫的狂欢宴会。

entry.def: You can refer to an activity as an orgy of that activity to emphasize that it is done to an excessive extent.

example.ex: One eyewitness said the rioters were engaged in an orgy of destruction...
example.tran: 一位目击者称暴徒肆无忌惮地到处进行破坏。

example.ex: He blew £533,000 in an 18-month orgy of spending.
example.tran: 他在18个月的奢靡生活中挥霍了533,000英镑。
